subject: Project Update - Q1 2024
body:
Hi John,

Here's the latest update on our project. Everything is going according to plan and we're on track for the Q1 delivery.

Key milestones completed:
- Backend API development
- Frontend UI implementation
- Database schema design
- Initial testing phase

Next steps:
- User acceptance testing
- Performance optimization
- Security audit

Thanks,
Bob

subject: Welcome to CustomMail!
body:
Hi John,

Welcome to your new self-hosted email service! This is a test email to show how the system works.

You can now:
- Send and receive emails
- Organize with folders
- Search through your messages
- Attach files

Best regards,
Alice
